<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 538</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The Commerce phase is when the kingdom generates revenue or makes trade agreements.
</column>
